condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Co-Financing | Description :The Co-Financing Deadline for the effectiveness of the Co-Financing Agreementcontemplated in the Preamble to the Financing Agreement shall be February 21, 2014. | Due Date :21-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Environmental and Social Safeguards | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that any construction of wells,new bore holes or other activity potentially involving ground water doesnot affect adversely its quantity or quality and isconfined to existing water delivery schemes. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Environmental and Social Safeguards | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that no activity under the Projector Subprojects affects Physical Cultural Resources. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Environmental and Social Safeguards | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that no activity under the Projector Subprojects involves the Involuntary Resettlement of the local population. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Operations Manual | Description :The Recipient shall make PDGs through MoFEP and LGB to Counties underParticipation Agreements, each to be entered into by representatives of the participating County, the relevant State and theRecipient, under terms and conditions which shall have been approvedby the Association and reflected in a template ParticipationAgreement to be included in the Operations Manual. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Comp 3 - Participating counties submitting approved (or passed) and complete plans and budgets by October 1
Intended beneficiaries aware of project info. and project investments –male
Sub-projects that are expected to have a mechanism for post-completion operation
Sub-projects with post-project community engagement or O&M arrangements (%)
Counties remaining eligible in subsequent year for the Payam Development Grant [County Performance]
Intended beneficiaries aware of project info. and project investments (%)
Financed subprojects functioning and delivering services to communities one year after completion [Service Delivery]
Participating payams with functioning Payam Development Committees [Participation]
Comp 1 - Eligible and reporting compliant counties being sent planned PDG disbursement within 30 days of due dates [Predictability]
Comp 1 - Eligible counties with variance between budgeted and actual PDG expenditures not exceeding 35 (percentage) [Execution]
Participants in consultation activities during project implementation (number)
Grievances related to delivery of project benefits that are addressed (number)
Participants in consultation activities during project implementation - female
Grievances registered related to delivery of project benefits addressed (%)
Improved basic services infrastructure in counties covered by the Program - Disaggregated list of investments by type and sector
Comp 3 - Subprojects adhering to technical standards and completed within one year of grant disbursement
Comp 3 - Participating counties with “clean” (not adverse or disclaimed) audit opinion on grant expenditures
Comp 1 - CDG and PDG Indicative Planning Figures published for counties by official due date [Transparency]
